item.title: It's Far Better To Learn
item.description: [[songs/g/garbage/version_20/you_look_so_fine.md#youre-taking-me-over-vyl-wnanory|You’d better learn that this will not blow over]] [[songs/g/garbage/version_20/you_look_so_fine.md#youre-taking-me-over-vyl-wnanory|And over]] [[songs/g/garbage/version_20/you_look_so_fine.md#youre-taking-me-over-vyl-wnanory|High above, they’re taking over you]] [[songs/g/garbage/version_20/you_look_so_fine.md#youre-taking-me-over-vyl-wnanory|And you should know]] [[songs/g/garbage/version_20/you_look_so_fine.
